channel.title: love on The Rules
channel.description: Recent content in love on The Rules

item.title: #9 - Perfect Love
item.description: They kiss each other tenderly. Mouth to mouth. The movie credits start rolling up. What is going to happen next? For some reason that stays behind the scenes all the time. They have gone through fire and water to get to their goal. Love. But how is love continued? Here is the kiss he’s been fighting for throughout the entire movie. What is next? What is going to happen tomorrow? After the credits.
